'''Susie''' is an [[NPC]] in the [[City of Mondstadt]]. She can be found praying in front of the God Statue in front of the [[Favonius Cathedral]] alongside [[Monroe]] and [[Grace]], with [[Sayid]] nearby to observe the prayer group.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Susie:''' May the Wind of Mondstadt always be with you.
:{{DIcon}} About Stormterror... ''(Only available between [[Dragon Storm]] and [[A Long Shot]])''
::'''Susie:''' Why did such a thing happen to Mondstadt...
::'''Susie:''' Did I not pray earnestly enough?
::'''Susie:''' ...No, it has to be someone else. I always pray with all my heart...
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Susie:''' I am just like you, one that is blessed by [[Barbatos]], the Anemo Archon.
::'''Susie:''' Shouldn't we show our gratitude to Barbatos for the wind and warmth?
::{{DIcon}} Wind of Mondstadt?
::'''Susie:''' Mondstadt is a city blessed by the Anemo Archon Barbatos.
::'''Susie:''' The wind blowing on Mondstadt is Barbatos' blessing.
:{{DIcon}} Are there any places worth visiting in the city?
::'''Susie:''' If you want to learn more about Barbatos, make sure to visit the Mondstadt Cathedral.
::'''Susie:''' It's said that Barbatos' sacred instrument, the Holy Lyre der Himmel, is enshrined in the Cathedral.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Susie:''' Goodbye, the one blessed by the Anemo Archon. May the Wind of Mondstadt always be with you.
{{Dialogue end}}
